Salesforce Integration Services

With over 8+ years of closely working with Salesforce, we are offering seamless Salesforce integrations services to make your business more productive and coherent. Dealing with The NineHertz, one of the most-trusted Salesforce integration companies in India is always a win-win situation for your business modules. Get your optimum integration plan with our experts today!

  • Certified Salesforce consulting partner
  • 360-degree customer view
  • Integration of numerous CRM solutions and modules
  • Real-time data synchronization
  • Easy Google app integration

Top Salesforce Integration Company in India

Wondering how to makes your Salesforce better? Integrate your daily working tools with Salesforce development. It adds speed to your productivity. Our Salesforce integration consultants have the plan for each type of Salesforce integration for you.

Salesforce combines cloud computing and CRM, that brings IT companies and customers together. Integrating one CRM platform gives a single and shared view of each customer. All departments such as Marketing, sales, commerce and much more are benefited with Salesforce CRM integration.

Make your organization work together to enhance your productivity at lightning speed. Marketing, collaboration, productivity, and beyond all of these, we connect your business to Salesforce to cultivate the best from your resources. What’s your integration plan? Share with us and let our experts help you with Salesforce CRM integration and others.

  • Complex Salesforce API integration that requires scalable solutions
  • Integrating customized solutions
  • Single authentication across the tools
  • AppExchange integration apps which are compatible with Salesforce CRM
  • Assuring complete confidentiality to our customers
  • We help to integrate your web and apps with both SOAP-based APIs and Rest APIs via Salesforce
  • Complete resource package of Salesforce support services to run your Salesforce solution smoothly

Easy information management

Holistic review of your business

Expeditious analysis of data

Features of The NineHertz Salesforce Integration Services

  • Force.com Integration Development

  • Salesforce Integration Design

  • Integration Processing

  • Integration Component Tests

What are The NineHertz Salesforce Integration Services?

Custom Salesforce Third-Party Integration

Our Salesforce integration developers develop the custom integrated modules which connect the business the Salesforce third party via Force.com hosted applications. We also build Salesforce AppExchange integration applications.

Custom Salesforce Third-Party Integration with Web Services

Our Salesforce integration experts provide assistance to combine your various solutions of web-based on Salesforce VisualForce. Get the data synchronization across your organization with the best Salesforce CRM integration company.

Salesforce API Integration

We help you connect your web and apps with Salesforce via various adaptable and scalable solutions. Being one of the top Salesforce integration companies with the highest volume in Salesforce integration consultants, we specialize in main APIs and other API based integration.

Salesforce Mulesoft Integration Services

As many people experienced, Salesforce has average performance when it comes to sales management and customer engagement practices. We offer Mulesoft to promote the sales process of combing and arranging the resources, along with the data of an organization.

Our AppExchange Product: Salesforce Development

Generate your own designed documents for any standard or custom object by just one click with no third party application integration

9Batch application helps Salesforce users to create dynamic batch jobs without writing any apex code. These batch job can be reused.

Why Choose The NineHertz for Salesforce CRM Integration Services?

The NineHertz Salesforce developers have extensive knowledge in Salesforce customizing services on the Force platform. The NineHertz is the leading Salesforce integration services provider company in India which mainly deals with cloud computing, Salesforce development, and app development. Our team of experienced Salesforce integration programmers are capable to integrate all the applications in a complex system and can develop the most efficient and effective Salesforce integration applications. Extract the maximum benefits of a powerful platform of Salesforce by integrating it with your business applications. We help you to reap most of the possibilities with a hassle-free Salesforce integration process.

  • Get all the customer data summarized in one place
  • Easy migration of data from apps to a common Salesforce platform
  • A means to magnify customer satisfaction and royalty
  • Expeditious Analysis of data-Holistic review of your business with deeper insight
  • Easy information management
  • An Expert’s Eye
    We have a pool of Salesforce consultants who can understand your idea of excellence with your set goals and provide the best solutions.
  • Blend of Stratagem
    Work within the cost peripheries helps us to stay ahead in the competition. You don’t have to put in extra efforts to bring out the best strategies.
  • Resilience
    We owe you customized solutions, and that’s why we maintain a healthy balance of resilience with the code of conduct.
  • Bounded By the Time
    On-time solutions and delivery is something we live by. Despite taking regular follow-ups, we strive to finish the project deadlines within time-frame.

Industries we work: Salesforce Integration Services

ERP Integration

Manage your sales and resources of the organization with a 360-degree view of customers. One can check the inventory details such as shipment, delivery status, generate invoices etc., directly from the CRM system. We have worked with several renowned ERP systems such as NetSuite, Acumatica, SAP, Sage, Oracle ERP Cloud, Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance and Operation and much more.

Accounting Integration

A single platform for managing the accounting system. It is beneficial for the sales team to get updated with the financial data and records, as well as for the users to get informed about the invoices, management of their profile and data driven insights. Overall, Salesforce accounting integration has made the ease way to work. Some of the examples are QuickBooks, Xero, Zoho Books, etc.
 

Marketing Integration

The coordination between the sales and marketing team is essential as it relies on one another. We integrate CRM and marketing module to establish a proper alignment between the two teams to manage the marketing campaigns, update with the cold leads and view the customer feedback. We have worked on major marketing automation integration such as HubSpot, Mailchimp, Marketo and Eloqua.

Alliance System integration

We can assist you in Share Point, Offcie365, Jive, Slack, etc. to manage your document and important records. Sometimes, people face document duplication and slow time in document retrieving. In such a case, we help you with the SharePoint integration overcome such issues and gives your employees a better time to focus on their work management.

CTI Integration

Connect third-party computer-telephony integration systems with the Salesforce which raises the graphs of your sale and boost up the speeds. It helps in improvement of call management through identification and routing of incoming calls, enabling the VoIP and PSTN calling, from analyzing the KPIs. Few of them are Ring Central, ShoreTel, etc.

eCommerce Integration

Major eCommerce platforms such as Magento, Shopify, wooCommerce etc, needs Salesforce integration to manage various tasks. The integration allows t to increase revenue and improve the productivity part. It helps to run campaigns, manage customer profiles, sales, inventory management and many other useful tasks.

Social Media Integration

To enhance user engagement and experience, it is important to track reps of social media. We integrate social media platform such as Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn to increase your customer visibility on your social media platforms.
 

Salesforce Email Integration

Managing your daily required tasks such as mails (including Gmail), tasks, appointments and contacts need to be organized and managed inefficient way. Get the Salesforce for your Microsoft Exchange and Outlook to increase your growth graphs.

Salesforce SAP Integration

Empower your sales and customer support functions by integrating SAP with CRM platform. Leverage The NineHertz integration experts to assist you find the right solution for your integration requirements.
 

  • Free Consultation

  • 24X7 Support and Maintenance

  • Easy Hiring Process

  • Use of Latest Technology

  • Experts Across the Globe

  • On-Time Delivery & Cost-Effective Solution
